{"id":529051913,"lang":"cpp","time":"8 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1627381796,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/529051913/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> res;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int j, k;\n        if(nums.size() <= 2)\n            return res;\n        for(int i = 0; i <= nums.size() - 3; i++)\n        {\n            j = i + 1;\n            k = nums.size() - 1;\n            while(j < k)\n            {\n                if(nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] == 0)\n                {\n                    res.push_back({nums[i], nums[j], nums[k]});\n                    break;\n                }\n                else if(nums[i] + nums[j] + nums[k] > 0)\n                    k--;\n                else\n                    j++;\n            }\n        }\n        return res;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum"}
